translation.en: [Bella] "These violent delights have violent ends.
translation.fr: Ces plaisirs violents ont des fins violentes.

translation.en: And in their triumph die, like fire and powder.
translation.fr: Dans leurs excès, ils meurent, tels la poudre et le feu...

translation.en: Which, as they kiss, consume."
Gran?
Edward, don't, she'll see you.
Gran, I'd like you to meet--
Happy birthday, Bella.
I thought we agreed no presents.
translation.fr: On a dit Pas de cadeau.

translation.en: Well, the one from me's not wrapped. So it doesn't count.
translation.fr: Le mien n'est pas emballé. Il ne compte pas.

translation.en: That's actually great. Thanks, Dad.
Uh, it goes with this one from your mom.
translation.fr: Il va avec celui de ta mère.

translation.en: We coordinated. Well, she coordinated me.
translation.fr: On s'est coordonnés. Enfin, elle m'a coordonné.

translation.en: It's to, uh, put your pictures in from senior year.
translation.fr: C'est pour tes photos de dernière année.

translation.en: Senior year.
How'd you get so old so fast?
I didn't.
-It's not that old. -I don't know.
Is that a gray hair?
translation.fr: J'en suis pas sûr. Un cheveu blanc ?

translation.en: No way.
Happy birthday.
That's really funny.
[man on radio] Another missing hiker brings the total to three presumed dead.
translation.fr: Un autre ranger disparu. Trois morts présumés.

translation.en: Rangers are searching for the killer animal--
[Jessica] Today's the big day, Bella.
Uh, R and J essay due?
translation.fr: Le devoir sur Roméo et Juliette.

translation.en: Wherefore art thou, Bella?
Let me take a picture of you guys.
My mom wants me to put together, like, a big scrapbook full of memories.
translation.fr: Une photo ? Ma mère... veut que je fasse... un album-souvenir.

translation.en: -Oh, cool, yeah. -I take 'em, I'm not in 'em, so…
No, no, no. Come here.
You'll Photoshop this if my nose looks big, right?
[Eric] Don't worry, I'm in the picture. No one will be looking at you guys.
translation.fr: T'inquiète, on ne verra que moi.

translation.en: [Bella] It's good.
-[Eric] Oh, good. -[Mike] Cullen's here.
Well, talk to you later.
-[Edward] Happy birthday. -Don't remind me.
Bell, your birth is definitely something to celebrate.
Yeah, but my aging is not.
Your aging?
I think 18 is a little young to start worrying about that.
-It's one year older than you. -No, it isn't.
translation.fr: - Un an de plus que toi. - Non.

translation.en: Maybe I shouldn't be dating such an old man. -Mmm. -It's gross.
translation.fr: Je fréquente un vieillard. C'est dégoûtant.

translation.en: -[Bella] I should be thoroughly repulsed. -Mmm.
We have to go to class.
Wait a second.
Someone wants you.
I'll leave you to talk.
[Bella] Hello, biceps.
You know, anabolic steroids are really bad for you.
[Jacob chuckles] Well, I'm just filling out, Bella.
translation.fr: C'est dangereux, les stéroïdes. Je m'étoffe, Bella.

translation.en: You know, it wouldn't seem so drastic if we hung out more.
translation.fr: Tu le verrais moins si on sortait davantage.

translation.en: You should switch schools. You can come hang out with the palefaces.
translation.fr: Change de bahut. Fréquente les visages pâles.

translation.en: I'm all right. I prefer the rez school's exclusivity.
translation.fr: Je préfère le lycée de la réserve.

translation.en: They let any old riff-raff into this place.
I see. Then why are you slummin' it?
I was just buying a part for the Rabbit.
translation.fr: J'achète une pièce pour mon bolide.

translation.en: You should really come take a ride when it's done.
translation.fr: Viens faire un tour quand il sera prêt.

translation.en: Is it fast?
Um… it's decent. -[both laugh] -[Bella] I'm kidding.
Okay. Good.
[Jacob] Your dad told my dad, so…
translation.fr: Ton père l'a dit au mien...

translation.en: Yeah, of course he did.
I saw this the other day and thought of you.
translation.fr: En voyant ça, j'ai pensé à toi.

translation.en: It catches bad dreams.
That's kind of perfect. Um…
No problem.
-Good seeing you. -Yeah, I'll see you later.
So how come Jacob Black gets to give you a gift and I don't?
translation.fr: Jacob peut te faire un cadeau, et pas moi ?

translation.en: 'Cause I have nothing to give back to you.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien à t'offrir en retour.

translation.en: Bella, you give me everything just by breathing.
translation.fr: C'est toi, mon plus beau cadeau.

translation.en: [Bella] See, thank you.
-That's all I want. -[Alice] Bella.
[scoffs] I thought I said no presents.
I've already seen you open it, and guess what?
-You love it. -[laughs]
You're gonna wear it tonight. Our place.
translation.fr: Tu le mets ce soir. Chez nous.

translation.en: Come on, please?
[Alice] It'll be fun.
[giggles] Great! Okay, I'll see you at seven.
Jasper. No fair with the mood control thing.
translation.fr: Jasper ! Ne contrôle pas mes humeurs.

translation.en: Sorry, Bella.
Never mind.
Can't trust vampires.
Trust me.
[man on TV] O, my love. My wife!
Death, that hath sucked the honey of thy breath, but hath no power yet upon thy beauty.
translation.fr: La mort qui a éteint ton haleine ne t'a pas encore enlaidie.

translation.en: [Bella] I hate being celebrated.
[Edward] There are worse tragedies. Look at Romeo.
translation.fr: Il y a pires tragédies. Regarde Roméo.

translation.en: Killed his true love out of sheer stupidity.
translation.fr: Il tua son seul amour par pure stupidité.

translation.en: But I do envy him one thing.
[Bella] Juliet is, like, perfect.
If you like that obviously beautiful sort of thing.
translation.fr: Si on est romantique à l'excès.

translation.en: Not the girl, the, uh… the suicide.
It's nearly impossible for, uh…
for some… people. [scoffs]
For humans, a little poison.
translation.fr: Pour les humains... un peu de poison...

translation.en: A dagger to the heart.
There's so many different options.
Why would you say that?
'Cause I had to consider it once.
[Edward] I didn't know if I'd get to you in time.
I had to come up with some kind of… plan.
What was the plan?
Go to Italy and provoke the Volturi.
translation.fr: Aller en Italie, provoquer les Volturi.

translation.en: -The what? -The Volturi.
[teacher] Now, who'd like to repeat the last few lines of iambic pentameter
translation.fr: Qui peut répéter les derniers pentamètres...

translation.en: just to show they were paying attention?
Mr. Cullen.
Uh, yes, Mr. Berty, um…
"O here,
will I set up my everlasting rest…
translation.fr: je veux fixer mon éternel repos...

translation.en: …and shake the yoke of inauspicious stars from this world-wearied flesh.
translation.fr: soustraire au joug des étoiles cette chair lasse.

translation.en: Eyes look your last.
Arms take your last embrace.
And lips, O you, the doors of breath,
translation.fr: Mes lèvres, portes de l'âme humaine,

translation.en: seal with a righteous kiss a dateless bargain to engrossing death."
translation.fr: scellez d'un baiser l'éternel pacte avec le sépulcre...

translation.en: Eyes on the screen, people.
[man on TV] Thus with a kiss, I die.
translation.fr: Je meurs ainsi... sur un baiser !

translation.en: [Edward] The Volturi are a very old, very powerful family.
translation.fr: Les Volturi sont une antique et puissante famille.

translation.en: I guess they're the closest thing to royalty my world has.
Is that Carlisle?
He lived with them for a few decades.
translation.fr: Il a vécu avec eux quelques décennies.

translation.en: Described them as very refined.
No respect for human life, of course,
translation.fr: Aucun respect pour la vie humaine, mais...

translation.en: but respect for the arts and the sciences, at least.
translation.fr: Aucun respect pour la vie humaine, mais... pour les arts et la science, au moins.

translation.en: And the law.
Above all, the law.
[Bella] Vampires have laws?
[Edward] Not very many.
And only one that's regularly enforced.
[Bella] What is it?
[Edward] That we keep the existence of our kind a secret.
We don't make spectacles of ourselves.
translation.fr: Ne pas se donner en spectacle.

translation.en: And we don't kill conspicuously.
Unless, of course, you want to die.
You gotta stop talking about that.
I can't even think… about someone hurting you.
translation.fr: Je ne supporte pas l'idée... qu'on te fasse du mal.

translation.en: The only thing that can hurt me is you.
translation.fr: Toi seule peux me faire souffrir.

translation.en: And I don't have anything else to be afraid of.
[clicks tongue] That's not true.
Victoria. She'll come for me one day.
Alice will see when she decides, and…
And we'll be ready.
I could protect you.
If you change me.
You already do protect me.
You're my only reason…
to stay alive, if that's what I am.
translation.fr: de rester... en vie. Si je puis dire.

translation.en: But it's my job to protect you.
translation.fr: C'est à moi de te protéger.

translation.en: From everyone except my sister.
translation.fr: De tous, sauf de ma sœur.

translation.en: [Alice] It's time.
Sorry about all this. We tried to rein Alice in.
translation.fr: Navré. - On voulait réfréner Alice. - Comme si c'était possible.

translation.en: As if that were even possible. Happy birthday, Bella.
translation.fr: - On voulait réfréner Alice. - Comme si c'était possible.

translation.en: I… found it in your bag. Mind?
translation.fr: Je l'ai trouvé dans ton sac. Je peux ?

translation.en: Dating an older woman. Hot.
[Alice] You first, Rosalie.
It's a necklace. Alice picked it out.
Show me the love.
This one's from Emmett.
Already installed it in your truck.
Finally a decent sound system for that piece of--
translation.fr: Une stéréo décente pour ce débris.

translation.en: Hey, don't… don't hate the truck.
[Alice laughs] Open Esme and Carlisle's.
[Carlisle] Just a little something to brighten your day.
Yes, you've been looking kind of pale lately.
translation.fr: On te trouve un peu pâle.

translation.en: [sucks teeth] Paper cut.
It's okay. It's just a little…
…blood.
[Carlisle] Get Jasper out of here.
I'm… I'm sorry, I can't.
I'll have to stitch this up in my office.
Check on Jasper.
[Carlisle] I'm sure he's very upset with himself, and I doubt he'll listen to anyone but you right now.
translation.fr: Il s'en veut sûrement et n'écoutera que toi.

translation.en: [Bella] I never wanted to have a party.
translation.fr: Je ne voulais pas de fête.

translation.en: [Carlisle] It's not your fault.
Jasper hasn't been away from human blood as long as the rest of us.
translation.fr: Jasper n'est sevré de sang humain que depuis peu.

translation.en: How do you do it?
Years and years of practice.
[Bella] Did you ever think of…
just doing it the easy way?
-I knew who I wanted to be. -[tool clinks]
translation.fr: Je savais qui je voulais être.

translation.en: I wanted to help people.
-Brings me happiness. -[snips]
-Even if I am damned, regardless. -[scissors clink]
translation.fr: Même si je dois être damné.

translation.en: Damned?
Like… like Hell? [scoffs]
Carlisle, you couldn't be damned.
-You couldn't. It's impossible. -[clicks tongue]
You've always been very… gracious about us.
translation.fr: Tu as toujours fait preuve... d'élégance envers nous.

translation.en: So that's it.
That's why he won't change me?
Imagine the situation in reverse, hmm?
If you believed as Edward does,
could you take away his soul?
You can't protect me.
From everything.
At some point, something's gonna separate us.
It's gonna be an accident or illness,
or old age.
As long as I'm human.
And the only solution is to change me.
That's not a solution, that's a tragedy.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas une solution. C'est une tragédie.

translation.en: You're not gonna want me when I look like a grandmother.
translation.fr: Tu me quitteras quand je serai une grand-mère.

translation.en: Bella, do you not understand my feelings for you at all?
Carlisle told me.
How you feel about your soul.
translation.fr: que tu as peur pour ton âme.

translation.en: I don't believe that.
So don't worry about mine.
translation.fr: Ne crains rien pour la mienne.

translation.en: You should go inside.
It's still my birthday.
So can I ask one thing?
Kiss me.
Come and take a walk with me. ♪ Folds in her gown ♪
We have to leave Forks.
Why?
Carlisle is supposed to be ten years older than he looks,
translation.fr: Carlisle devrait paraître dix ans de plus.

translation.en: and people are starting to notice.
I've got to think of something to say to Charlie.
When you say "we"…
I mean my family and myself.
Edward, what happened with Jasper… It's nothing.
translation.fr: Cette histoire avec Jasper... c'est rien.

translation.en: You're right. It was nothing.
Nothing but what I always expected.
And nothing compared to what could have happened.
translation.fr: Et rien à côté de ce qui aurait pu être.

translation.en: You just don't belong in my world, Bella.
translation.fr: C'est mon monde, pas le tien.

translation.en: I belong with you.
[Edward] No, you don't.
I'm coming.
I don't want you to come.
You don't want me.
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas de moi ?

translation.en: That changes things.
A lot. [exhales deeply]
But if it's not too much to ask,
can you just promise me something?
Don't do anything reckless.
For Charlie's sake.
And I'll promise something to you in return.
translation.fr: Je te fais une promesse en retour.

translation.en: This is the last time you'll ever see me.
I won't come back.
And you can go on with your life without any interference from me.
translation.fr: Tu vivras ta vie sans que j'interfère.

translation.en: It'll be like…
I never existed, I promise.
If this is about my soul, take it.
translation.fr: Si tu veux mon âme... prends-la. Je n'en veux pas, sans toi.

translation.en: I don't want it without you.
translation.fr: prends-la. Je n'en veux pas, sans toi.

translation.en: It's not about your soul.
You're just not good for me.
translation.fr: Tu ne m'apportes rien de bien.

translation.en: Not good enough for you. [breathes shakily]
I'm just sorry I let this go on for so long.
translation.fr: J'ai laissé ça durer trop longtemps.

translation.en: Don't. [breathes heavily]
I'm going to try the Cullens' place again.
The Cullens left town, Charlie.
Good riddance.
Where'd they go?
We'll find her, Charlie.
She's all right.
I got her.
Thank you, Sam.
You've disappeared.
Like everything else.
Who else can I talk to? I'm lost.
translation.fr: À qui d'autre parler ? Je suis perdue.

translation.en: ♪ There's a possibility ♪
When you left…
…and he left,
…you took everything with you.
But the absence of him is everywhere I look.
It's like a huge hole has been punched through my chest.
translation.fr: C'est comme un trou béant dans ma poitrine.

translation.en: [Bella] But in a way, I'm glad.
The pain is my only reminder that he was real.
translation.fr: La souffrance me prouve sa réalité.

translation.en: That you all were.
All right, that's it.
You're going to Jacksonville. Live with your mother.
translation.fr: Tu vas à Jacksonville, chez ta mère.

translation.en: I'm not leaving Forks.
He's not coming back.
I know.
It's just not normal, this behavior.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas normal, ce comportement.

translation.en: [Charlie] Quite frankly, it's scaring the hell out of me
and your mother.
Baby, I… I don't want you to leave.
translation.fr: Je n'ai pas envie que tu partes.

translation.en: I don't, but just go. Go to Jacksonville.
translation.fr: Je t'assure, mais... va à Jacksonville, fais-toi des amis.

translation.en: -Make some new friends. -I like my old friends.
translation.fr: va à Jacksonville, fais-toi des amis. J'aime mes anciens amis.

translation.en: [Charlie] Well, you never see 'em anymore. I do, I…
translation.fr: - Tu ne les vois plus. - Si.

translation.en: I'm… [sighs]
…gonna, uh, go shopping tomorrow with Jessica.
translation.fr: faire du shopping, demain, avec Jessica.

translation.en: You hate shopping.
…need a girls night out.
translation.fr: J'ai besoin d'une soirée entre filles.

translation.en: Girls night.
Shopping.
I like it. Go.
Buy some stuff.
Hi, Jessica, it's Bella.
Uh, yeah, Bella Swan.
[Jessica] I don't know why you want to sit through
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu préfères ces zombies cannibales

translation.en: all those zombies eating people and no hot guys kissing anybody.
translation.fr: Pourquoi tu préfères ces zombies cannibales à des mecs sexy ?

translation.en: It's gross, like…
Why are there that many zombie movies anyway?
If it's supposed to, like, draw a parallel about leprosy,
translation.fr: Si c'est rapport à la lèpre...

translation.en: my cousin had leprosy. It's not funny, you know.
translation.fr: mon cousin était lépreux. C'est pas drôle.

translation.en: And, like, is it supposed to be a metaphor for consumerism,
'cause don't be so pleased with your own, like, self-reverential cleverness, you know.
translation.fr: N'imagine pas être le nombril du monde.

translation.en: Like, some girls like to shop. Not all girls, apparently.
translation.fr: Certaines filles aiment le shopping. Pas toutes.

translation.en: Though I was surprised you even called at all, you know?
translation.fr: Ton coup de fil m'a étonnée.

translation.en: Like, your depression thing, I get it. I'm totally, totally worried.
translation.fr: Comme ta dépression. Ça m'a inquiétée.

translation.en: But after a while, it's like, -you're still bumming? -[man] Want a ride, girls? And I'm going through stuff too.
translation.fr: Et ça s'arrange pas. J'ai aussi des problèmes.

translation.en: -[man] What's up? -[Jessica chatter indistinctly]
translation.fr: Mike veut seulement être un ami.

translation.en: [Jessica] It's hard, you know, like…
-What's up, guys? -[indistinct chatter]
Where are you going?
-Keep walking. -[gasps]
This is dangerous.
Dude, come on.
-[man] Come here for a sec. -[Jessica scoffs]
I think I know those guys.
translation.fr: Je crois que je les connais.

translation.en: [man] We got beer. We got bikes.
Well, they seem great. Can we go?
I'm just gonna see something.
[man] Hey, girlie!
All right, all right, we got a taker.
-Turn around. -♪ All my life I've been searching♪
I'm sorry, I thought you were somebody else.
No, that's cool. I'll be whoever you want me to be, honey.
So, what do you say?
You promised me nothing reckless.
You promised it would be as if you never existed.
You lied.
Did you say something, babe? You know what, never mind.
[Jessica] Hey, um, what the hell's wrong with you?
Just curious?
I thought that I saw something.
You're insane, actually, or suicidal.
That homeboy could have been a psycho.
translation.fr: Ce voyou aurait pu être un tueur.

translation.en: I was about to end up in an FBI interview room like some lame TV show.
translation.fr: J'aurais fini au FBI, comme dans ces séries.

translation.en: God, that was such a rush.
Awesome, so you're an adrenaline junkie now?
translation.fr: Génial. Tu te shootes à l'adrénaline ?

translation.en: That's cool, you can go bungee jumping. You don't get on the back of some random loser's motorcycle.
translation.fr: Fais du saut à l'élastique, pas de la moto avec un paumé.

translation.en: Crazy!
[Bella] Alice. I saw him.
Maybe I'm crazy now. I guess that's okay.
translation.fr: Je suis peut-être folle. Peu importe.

translation.en: If a rush of danger is what it takes to see him,
translation.fr: S'il faut du danger pour le voir...

translation.en: then that's what I'll find.
Where the hell have you been, loca?
[sighs] I, uh, brought you something.
It's a little crazy.
Wow. Scrap metal.
translation.fr: Des tas de ferraille. C'est trop.

translation.en: -You shouldn't have. -I saved it from the junkyard.
translation.fr: Des tas de ferraille. C'est trop. Récupérées à la décharge.

translation.en: I think they'll probably cost more to fix than they're worth.
But then I thought that if I had a mechanic friend - to help me out, then… - Ah, me.
translation.fr: Mais si un ami mécano m'aidait...

translation.en: Being the mechanic-type friend?
Since when are you into motorcycles?
translation.fr: Depuis quand tu aimes la moto ?

translation.en: Since now.
I get it if you think that this is really stupid and reckless.
translation.fr: Tu dois trouver ça stupide et imprudent.

translation.en: Yeah, I mean it's completely stupid and reckless.
When do we start?
Now. [chuckles]
Oh, wait, be careful.
Those things are actually really heavy, so…
Jake, you're, like, buff. How did that happen?
translation.fr: Tu es un surhomme. Comment c'est arrivé ?

translation.en: You're, like, 16. I don't get it.
[chuckles] Age is just a number, baby. What are you, like, 40 now?
translation.fr: L'âge n'est rien. Tu as 40 ans ?

translation.en: -♪ I may never ever find a cure ♪ -Feels like that sometimes.
That song's good. You don't like it?
Um, I don't really like… …music anymore, kind of.
translation.fr: Je n'aime plus... la musique, en fait.

translation.en: Okay. No more music.
So, I was thinking, if we're going to do this every day,
translation.fr: Si on fait ça tous les jours,

translation.en: and hopefully we will,
we have to, like, fit some homework in there somewhere.
translation.fr: il faut trouver le temps d'étudier.

translation.en: I don't want Billy thinking that I'm a bad influence on you.
translation.fr: Billy dirait que j'ai une influence négative.

translation.en: You, influence me?
I'm older than you, so…
…that makes me the influencer, and you the influencee.
translation.fr: Je suis plus âgée. J'influence, tu es influencé.

translation.en: My size and knowledge base actually makes me older than you,
translation.fr: Ma taille et mon savoir font de moi l'aîné.

translation.en: because of your general paleness and lack of know-how.
translation.fr: Tu es trop pâle et trop novice.

translation.en: I convinced you to build two-wheeled death machines with me.
translation.fr: Je te fais retaper deux machines de mort.

translation.en: Don't you think that makes you kind of young and naive?
Okay, so where do we stand?
-And you might be, like, 32. -[knock at door]
[man] Yo, Jake, you in there?
No, it's ok, it's just my boys.
-Hey, Jake. -Hey, guys, this is Bella.
-Hey. -Bella, that's Quil and Embry.
I'm Quil Ateara.
So the bike-building story's true.
Oh, yeah, yeah. I taught him everything he knows.
What about the part where you're his girlfriend?
Uh, we're friends, you know.
-Ooh, burn. -[laughs]
Actually, remember I said she's a girl and a friend.
translation.fr: J'ai dit... que c'était une fille et une amie.

translation.en: Embry, do you remember him making that distinction? Nope.
translation.fr: Tu te souviens de la nuance ?

translation.en: So you guys have girlfriends. That's awesome.
translation.fr: Vous avez des petites amies ? Incroyable.

translation.en: Yeah, right. Quil's actually taking his cousin to prom.
translation.fr: Quil a invité sa cousine au bal.

translation.en: -[laughs] -Yeah, that's still a riot. You want funny, Black? I'll give you funny.
translation.fr: On en rit encore. Tu veux te marrer ?

translation.en: [Jacob] Yeah, that hold's illegal!
[Embry] I got five bucks on Quil.
You're on.
[Bella] Dear Alice, I wish I had your real address.
translation.fr: Chère Alice... J'aimerais avoir ton adresse.

translation.en: I wish I could tell you about Jake.
He makes me feel better.
I mean, he makes me feel alive.
translation.fr: Près de lui, je me sens vivante.

translation.en: The hole in my chest.
Well, when I'm with Jake, it's…
…it's like it's almost healed.
For a while.
[Jacob] So, Quil keeps asking to come over.
I think he likes you a little too much.
Well, I'm really not into the whole cougar thing, you know?
translation.fr: Je fais pas dans le jeunisme.

translation.en: What's up with you and age?
I mean, how old was that Cullen guy anyway?
[Bella] But even Jake can't keep the dreams away.
translation.fr: Mais même Jake n'arrête pas les cauchemars.

translation.en: -[panting] -You're okay. You're okay.
Well, I thought this thing was starting to work, but…
translation.fr: Je croyais que ce truc fonctionnait.

translation.en: I guess not.
Can I ask you something?
Hanging out with Jacob.
That seems to take your mind off things a bit, doesn't it?
You know, sometimes…
…you gotta learn to love what's good for you.
translation.fr: il faut apprécier ce qui fait du bien.

translation.en: You know what I mean?
Of course, what do I know?
I'm just a terminal bachelor.
Famous ladies' man.
Go to bed.
If I told you I couldn't have fixed these bikes, what would you have said?
translation.fr: Si j'avais dit que je ne pouvais pas les réparer ?

translation.en: Are you doubting your mad skills?
translation.fr: Tu doutes de tes immenses talents ?

translation.en: No. Definitely not. I mean, they'll run fine.
It's just, uh…
Maybe if I was smart, I would have dragged out the rebuild a bit.
translation.fr: si j'avais été malin, j'aurais fait traîner.

translation.en: If you told me you couldn't fix these bikes,
translation.fr: Si tu m'avais dit ça, j'aurais dit...

translation.en: I would say that that's really too bad,
translation.fr: Si tu m'avais dit ça, j'aurais dit... Dommage, mais...

translation.en: but that we're just gonna have to find something else to do.
translation.fr: Dommage, mais... on trouvera autre chose à faire.

translation.en: Is that Sam Uley?
Him and his cult.
Did you see that?
They're not really fighting, Bella. They're cliff diving.
translation.fr: Ils ne se battent pas. Ils sautent.

translation.en: Scary as hell, but a total rush.
A rush? [Jacob] Most of us jump from lower down.
translation.fr: - Le pied ? - On saute de plus bas.

translation.en: We leave the showing off to Sam and his disciples.
translation.fr: On laisse Sam et ses disciples se la jouer.

translation.en: You have some kind of beef with him or something?
I don't know.
[Jacob] They just think they run this place.
Embry used to call them hall monitors on steroids.
translation.fr: Embry les appelait les scouts sous stéroïdes.

translation.en: -Now look at him. -[Bella] That's Embry?
-Yeah. -What happened to him?
He missed some school.
Now, all of a sudden, he started following Sam around like a little puppy.
translation.fr: Et il s'est mis à suivre Sam comme un petit chien.

translation.en: Same thing happened with Paul and Jared.
Sam keeps giving me this look.
Like he's waiting for me or something.
It's kind of starting to freak me out.
Well, you should just avoid him.
I try.
-You look scared. -I'm not.
-[Jacob] Brake? -[Bella] That one.
Clutch? Good.
Gas.
[Jacob] Ready?
-[gasps] -Now slowly release the clutch.
[Jacob] You all right?
I'm gonna go again.
Hit the brake!
-I want to go again. -Are you trying to get yourself killed?
translation.fr: - Je recommence. - Tu veux te suicider ?

translation.en: -I want to go again. -No, forget it.
No more bikes.
[Jacob] Man, your head.
-Yeah. -Oh, my God, I'm sorry.
What, you're apologizing for bleeding?
Yeah, I guess I am.
Well, it's just blood, Bella. No big deal.
What are you staring at?
-You're sort of beautiful. -[Jacob chuckles]
How hard did you hit your head?
-I don't know. -[chuckling]
[Jacob] Let's go.
[Angela] I did see something in the woods.
translation.fr: J'ai vu un truc dans les bois.

translation.en: Totally. Baby, I believe you.
No, he doesn't. He's just trying to get lucky.
translation.fr: - Je te crois. - Il ment. Il te drague.

translation.en: [Angela] No. It was jet black and huge.
On all fours, it was still taller than a person.
translation.fr: À 4 pattes, c'est plus grand qu'un homme.

translation.en: A bear, maybe?
Or an alien. You're lucky you didn't get probed.
translation.fr: Ou un alien. Il aurait pu te sonder.

translation.en: [Angela] Well, I saw it.
[Bella] You know you're not the only one.
Um, my dad's been getting reports at the station.
Like, five hikers have been killed by some bear,
but they can't find the bear.
Last time you clowns doubt my girlfriend.
translation.fr: Ne doutez plus de ma copine.

translation.en: So, I mean…
…Bella's back.
Yeah, I guess so.
All right, that's… Well, welcome.
Um, so listen, you know, now that, you know, you're talking and, uh…
translation.fr: Maintenant que tu parles et que...

translation.en: eating again, which, you know, gotta get that protein in there.
translation.fr: tu recommences à te nourrir... tu as besoin de protéines...

translation.en: I was just wondering if you wanted to go see a movie with me.
translation.fr: je me demandais si tu viendrais au ciné avec moi.

translation.en: Yeah, sure.
Cool, um… Let me see, we could check out, um…
[clicks tongue] Love Spelled Backwards Is Love.
translation.fr: L'amour à en perdre la tête.

translation.en: You know, it's a dumb title, but, um, it's a romantic comedy.
translation.fr: Oublie le titre, c'est une comédie romantique.

translation.en: -I mean, it's supposed to be… -No. No romance.
translation.fr: Il paraît que c'est... Pas d'amour.

translation.en: How about Face Punch? Have you heard of that?
translation.fr: Combat à Mort ? On t'en a parlé ?

translation.en: [stammers] I mean, that's an action movie.
Yeah, it's perfect.
Um, guns, adrenaline.
It's my thing.
We should get a bunch of people to go. Do you guys want to go see…
translation.fr: On devrait tous y aller. Vous voulez voir

translation.en: -Face Punch? -[Eric] Face Punch, yeah.
Mike, hey. We were supposed to watch that. Remember, the trailer's like… [imitates explosion]
translation.fr: On devait y aller. Tu sais, le film-annonce ?

translation.en: -Yeah? -Punch faces…
translation.fr: On devait y aller. Tu sais, le film-annonce ? Je me souviens.

translation.en: Movie night with Bella. [chuckles awkwardly]
[Jacob] So, Face Punch, huh?
You like action movies?
Not really.
I heard it sucks. Bad.
You know, are you even old enough to see this movie?
translation.fr: Tu as l'âge pour le voir ?

translation.en: I mean, you know, without, like, adult supervision?
Right, yeah. Well, she's buying my ticket for me. Buying it, okay.
translation.fr: - Elle prend mon billet. - Je vois.

translation.en: Jessica bailed, and Angela got the stomach flu,
translation.fr: Jessica s'excuse, Angela a une gastro.

translation.en: so Eric's taking care of her.
-It's just us three. -Great.
-[gun cocks in movie] -[man 1] Put your gun down.
[man 2] Put her gun down, or I'm gonna blow your frickin' head off.
translation.fr: Pose ton flingue ou je t'explose.

translation.en: [man 3] Both of you put both of your guns down,
or I'm gonna blow both of your frickin' heads off.
translation.fr: Ou je vous explose tous les deux.

translation.en: [man 1] All right, forget it. Let's do this! -[gunfire] -[shouting]
Okay, I… I think I'm gonna throw up. [groans]
What a marshmallow.
You should hold out for someone with a stronger stomach.
Someone who laughs at the gore that makes weaker men vomit.
translation.fr: Un mec que le sang fait rire, pas vomir.

translation.en: Yeah, I'll keep my eye open for that.
I feel bad, he probably has that flu that's… going around.
translation.fr: Je m'en veux. Il doit avoir... cette gastro.

translation.en: What, I can't hold your hand?
translation.fr: Je peux pas te tenir la main ?

translation.en: No, of course you can.
I just think it, you know, means something a little different to you, so…
translation.fr: Mais ça a un autre sens pour toi...

translation.en: Okay, well, tell me something. You like me, right?
And you think I'm sort of beautiful.
translation.fr: Et tu me trouves plutôt beau.

translation.en: [softly] Jake, please. Don't do this.
Why?
'Cause you're about to ruin everything.
And… I need you.
Well, I've got loads of time.
I'm not gonna give up.
I don't want you to.
But…
It's just 'cause I don't want you to go anywhere.
translation.fr: c'est pour ne pas te perdre.

translation.en: That's really selfish.
You know, I'm not like a car that you can fix up.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas une voiture qu'on retape.

translation.en: I'm never gonna run right, so I should be fair to you.
translation.fr: Je ne tournerai jamais rond. Autant être honnête.

translation.en: It's because of him, right?
Look…
I know what he did to you.
translation.fr: je sais ce qu'il t'a fait.

translation.en: And Bella, I would never, ever do that.
translation.fr: Je ne pourrais jamais faire ça.

translation.en: I won't ever hurt you. I promise.
translation.fr: Je ne te ferai jamais souffrir. Promis.

translation.en: I won't let you down.
You can count on me.
I need to go home.
I'm… I was feeling sick before the movie, okay?
translation.fr: J'étais malade avant le film, d'accord ?

translation.en: What is your problem?
Right now, you're my problem.
Feeling sick? Maybe you need to go to the hospital.
You want me to put you in the hospital?
translation.fr: Tu veux que je t'y envoie ?

translation.en: Jake. Jake, Jake, the movie's over. What are you doing?
You're… really hot.
Like, you feel like you have a fever. Are you okay?
I don't know what's happening.
I gotta go.
-[door closes] -Dude is weird.
[Bella on phone] Jake, your dad says you have mono?
He won't let me visit, but would you call me?
translation.fr: Il ne veut pas que je vienne. Appelle.

translation.en: Hey. It's me again, I just…
I'm sorry about what I said at the movie theater.
translation.fr: Pardon pour ce que je t'ai dit.

translation.en: I just wanted to hear your voice, so no pressure.
translation.fr: Je voulais t'entendre. Rien ne presse.

translation.en: -Call me. -[phone clanks]
[Charlie] Okay. We should be back around three.
Look, I don't have to go fishing today.
translation.fr: Je suis pas obligé d'aller pêcher.

translation.en: Yes, you do.
Yeah, you do. Go. What are you talking about?
translation.fr: Si, vas-y. Ne dis pas de sottises.

translation.en: Just be careful.
Always am.
Those bears won't get the drop on me, Bella.
My kung fu is strong.
You cut your hair off?
And got a tattoo?
I thought you were too sick to come outside.
translation.fr: Je te croyais trop malade pour sortir !

translation.en: Or pick up the phone when I call.
Go away.
Go away.
What happened to you? What's wrong? Hey!
What happened?
Did Sam get to you? Is that what's happening?
No, Sam's trying to help me. Don't blame him.
translation.fr: Sam essaie de m'aider. Ne l'accuse pas.

translation.en: But if you want somebody to blame,
how about those filthy bloodsuckers you love?
translation.fr: pense à tes buveurs de sang adorés,

translation.en: The Cullens.
-I don't know what you're talking about. -You know exactly what I'm talking about.
translation.fr: - Je ne vois pas. - Tu vois très bien.

translation.en: You've been lying to everyone. Charlie.
translation.fr: Tu as menti à tout le monde. À Charlie.

translation.en: But you can't lie to me.
-Not anymore, Bella. -[man] Jacob!
Look, Bella…
we can't be friends anymore.
translation.fr: on ne peut plus être amis.

translation.en: [stammering] Jake, I know that I've been…
…hurting you.
It's… it's killing me.
I just need… maybe, give me, like, some time or something--
translation.fr: J'ai peut-être... besoin d'un peu de temps.

translation.en: Don't.
It's not you.
It's not you, it's me, right? Really?
translation.fr: C'est pas toi, c'est moi ? Vraiment ?

translation.en: It's true. It is me.
I'm not… good.
I used to be. A good kid.
Not anymore.
This doesn't even matter, all right?
-This is over. -You can't break up with me.
translation.fr: - C'est fini. - Tu ne peux pas.

translation.en: I mean, you're my best friend.
You promised me.
I know.
I promised I wouldn't hurt you, Bella.
translation.fr: J'ai promis de ne pas te faire souffrir.

translation.en: And this is me keeping that promise.
Go home.
And don't come back. Or you're gonna get hurt.
translation.fr: Et ne reviens pas. Tu en souffrirais.

translation.en: things are…
Things are bad again.
Without Jake, I just… I can't stand it.
I don't see Edward anymore.
But I really feel like he never existed.
I will find the place where I can see him again.
translation.fr: J'irai là où je peux le revoir.

translation.en: Laurent.
I didn't expect to find you here.
I went to visit Cullens, but…
their house is empty.
I'm surprised they left you behind.
Aren't you sort of, um…
a pet of theirs?
Yeah, you could say that.
Do the Cullens visit often?
-Lie. -[gasps]
Yeah, absolutely, all the time.
Lie better.
I'll tell them that you stopped by.
translation.fr: Je leur dirai que vous êtes passé.

translation.en: I probably shouldn't, uh, tell…
Edward. [clears throat]
'Cause he's pretty protective.
But he's far away, isn't he?
Why are you here?
I came as a…
favor to Victoria.
She asked me to see if you were still under the protection of the Cullens.
translation.fr: Elle se demande si tu es toujours la protégée des Cullen.

translation.en: Victoria feels it's only fair to kill Edward's mate,
translation.fr: Elle estime équitable de tuer l'amie d'Edward...

translation.en: given he killed hers. An eye for an eye.
translation.fr: puisqu'il a tué le sien. Oeil pour œil.

translation.en: Threaten him.
Edward would know who did it.
And he'd come after you.
I don't think he will.
After all, how much could you mean to him
if he left you here unprotected?
translation.fr: s'il t'a laissée ici à ma merci ?

translation.en: Oh, Victoria won't be happy about my killing you.
translation.fr: Victoria m'en voudra de t'avoir tuée.

translation.en: But I can't help myself. You are so mouthwatering.
translation.fr: Mais je n'y peux rien. Tu es si appétissante.

translation.en: Please don't. I mean, you helped us.
Don't be afraid. I'm doing you a kindness.
translation.fr: Ne crains rien. Je te fais une fleur.

translation.en: [whispers] Victoria plans on killing you slowly.
-Painfully. -[breathes heavily]
Whereas I'll make it quick.
I promise.
You will feel nothing.
Edward, I love you.
-[growling] -[Laurent] I don't believe it.
Dad, I saw them. What's the matter?
-In the woods. They're not bears. -What do you mean, in the woods?
translation.fr: Dans les bois. Ce ne sont pas des ours. Dans les bois ?

translation.en: Bell, what the hell were you doing out in the woods?
They're wolves. I mean, they're, like, huge wolves.
translation.fr: Ce sont des loups. Des loups gigantesques !

translation.en: Are you sure about that, Bella?
translation.fr: - Tu es sûre ? - Je viens de les voir.

translation.en: Yeah, I just saw them. They were after… something.
translation.fr: - Tu es sûre ? - Je viens de les voir. Ils poursuivaient... quelque chose.

translation.en: -[Harry clears throat] -Wolves?
You saw 'em.
All right. Well… Harry?
Feel like going hunting? Get some of your guys together?
translation.fr: Harry ? On va chasser ? Rassemble tes gars.

translation.en: Sure, yeah, I'll, I'll just, uh…
[Bella] By now, those wolves will be dead.
And Laurent would have told her I'm unprotected.
translation.fr: Elle sait que je suis vulnérable.

translation.en: I should go to the station.
Dad, you should… you should go.
[Charlie] Can you just stay in the house?
translation.fr: Tu peux rester à la maison ?

translation.en: Oh, you scared me. What the hell are you doing?
translation.fr: Tu m'as fait peur. - Tu es fou ? - Recule.

translation.en: Back up, I'm coming up.
[stammers] Look, I'm sorry.
-For what? -I wish I could explain.
But I literally… can't.
translation.fr: Mais je ne peux... vraiment pas.

translation.en: Have you ever had a secret you couldn't tell anyone?
translation.fr: Tu as déjà eu un véritable secret ?

translation.en: One that wasn't yours to share?
Well, that's what it's like for me.
But worse.
You have no idea how tight I'm bound.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas idée... du poids de ce serment.

translation.en: I hate this.
I hate what they've done to you.
I mean, the killer part is you already know.
translation.fr: Le plus beau, c'est que tu sais déjà.

translation.en: Bella, do you remember when we walked on the beach at La Push?
translation.fr: Tu te souviens de la plage de La Push ?

translation.en: The story. The story about…
the cold ones.
I guess I understand why that's the only part you remember.
translation.fr: Je sais pourquoi tu te souviens de ça.

translation.en: There's gotta be something…
-that you can do. -No. I'm in it for life.
translation.fr: une solution. C'est pour la vie.

translation.en: Maybe we should just get out of here for awhile.
We'll just leave. Just you and me.
You'd do that?
I would do it for you.
It's not something I can just run away from, Bella.
translation.fr: Je ne peux pas fuir ça.

translation.en: But I would run away with you.
If I could.
I gotta go.
They'll start wondering where I am.
Come here.
[Jacob] Please. Try to remember.
It'd be so much easier if you knew.
translation.fr: Ce serait plus simple... si tu savais.

translation.en: I'll try. But, Jake…
Jake, what are you doing? Wait, Jake.
[Bella] Edward, I'm scared.
[Edward] You should be.
[Jacob] Really, it's just, like, an old story.
translation.fr: En fait, ce n'est qu'une légende.

translation.en: I'm not really supposed to say anything about it.
translation.fr: Je ne suis pas censé en parler.

translation.en: Did you know Quileutes are supposedly descended from wolves?
translation.fr: On dit que les Quileute descendent des loups.

translation.en: I need to see him.
He's not in.
Look, I'm sorry, I really need to see him.
translation.fr: Il faut que je le voie.

translation.en: What did you do?
-What did you do? -[man] Hey! -What did you do to him? -Easy.
-He didn't want this. -What did we do?
translation.fr: Il ne voulait pas ! Nous ? Et lui, il t'a dit quoi ?

translation.en: What did he do, hmm? What'd he tell you?
translation.fr: Nous ? Et lui, il t'a dit quoi ?

translation.en: -Both of you, calm down. -Nothing.
He tells me nothing because he's scared of you.
translation.fr: Rien, il a peur de vous !

translation.en: -Too late now. -[Sam] Bella, get back!
-[Paul growling] -[Sam] Paul! Calm down now.
-Run! -[growls]
Jake, run!
Hey. Take Bella back to Emily's place.
Guess the wolf's out of the bag.
is it possible that everything is true?
translation.fr: Se pourrait-il que tout soit vrai ?

translation.en: The fairy tales and horror stories.
translation.fr: Les contes de fées et d'horreur ?

translation.en: Is it possible that there isn't anything sane and normal at all?
translation.fr: Que rien ne soit sensé ou normal ?

translation.en: Hey, I think we should go back and see if Jacob's okay.
translation.fr: Retournons voir si Jacob va bien.

translation.en: I hope Paul sinks some teeth in him. Serves him right.
No way, Jacob's a natural. You see him phase on the fly?
translation.fr: Non, il a ça en lui. Tu l'as vu faire ?

translation.en: [Jared] I got five says Paul doesn't touch him.
translation.fr: 5 $ que Paul ne le touche pas.

translation.en: Come on in, Bella. We won't bite.
translation.fr: Entre, Bella ! On ne mord pas.

translation.en: Speak for yourself.
Oh, hey, about Emily, Sam's fiancée. Don't stare. It bugs Sam.
translation.fr: À propos d'Emily, la fiancée de Sam. Ne la fixe pas, ça agace Sam.

translation.en: Why would I stare?
[Emily] You guys hungry? Like I have to ask.
Who's this?
[Jared] Bella Swan. Who else?
Hmm, so… You're the vampire girl.
So, you're… the wolf girl.
translation.fr: Et tu es... la fille aux loups.

translation.en: Guess so. Well, I'm engaged to one.
translation.fr: On dirait. Mon fiancé en est un.

translation.en: Save some for your brothers.
And ladies first. Muffin?
Leave it to Jacob to find a way around Sam's gag order.
translation.fr: Jacob a dû contourner l'ordre de Sam.

translation.en: Um, he didn't say anything to me.
That's a wolf thing. Alpha's orders get obeyed whether we want 'em to or not.
translation.fr: Règle des loups. Obéir aux ordres du mâle dominant.

translation.en: Oh, and check it out. We can hear each other's thoughts.
translation.fr: Et nous lisons dans nos pensées.

translation.en: Would you shut up? These are trade secrets.
Damn it! This chick runs with vampires.
translation.fr: Secret professionnel, bordel ! Elle court avec les vampires.

translation.en: You can't really run with vampires.
'Cause they're fast.
Well, we're faster.
Freaked out yet?
You're not the first monsters I've met.
Jake's right. You're good with weird.
translation.fr: Jacob dit vrai. Tu aimes l'étrange.

translation.en: Sorry.
So you're a werewolf.
Yeah. Last time I checked.
A few lucky members of the tribe have the gene.
translation.fr: Quelques chanceux de la tribu ont le gène.

translation.en: If a bloodsucker moves into town,
then the fever sets in.
Mono.
Yeah, I wish.
Well, can't you find a way to just…
stop?
I mean, it's wrong.
It's not a lifestyle choice, Bella.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas un choix de vie.

translation.en: I was born this way, I can't help it.
You're such a hypocrite. What, I'm not the right kind of monster for you?
translation.fr: Hypocrite. Je ne suis pas ton monstre idéal ?

translation.en: It's not what you are.
translation.fr: Ce n'est pas ce que tu es.

translation.en: It's what you do. They never hurt anybody.
translation.fr: C'est ce que tu fais. Ils ne font pas de mal.

translation.en: -You've killed people, Jake. -Bella.
We're not killing anyone.
Then who is?
What we're trying to protect you people from.
The only thing we do kill.
Vampires.
Wait, Jake, you can't.
Don't worry, we can't touch your little precious Cullens
translation.fr: On ne touchera à tes précieux Cullen que s'ils...

translation.en: unless they violate the treaty.
translation.fr: On ne touchera à tes précieux Cullen que s'ils... violent le traité.

translation.en: I… It's not what I'm saying. [stutters]
translation.fr: Je ne parle pas de ça.

translation.en: You can't kill vampires. They'll…
translation.fr: Tu ne peux pas les tuer.

translation.en: They'll kill you.
Really? We took out that leech with the dreads easy enough.
translation.fr: Tu crois ? On a eu cette sangsue à dreadlocks.

translation.en: Laurent?
And his red-headed girlfriend is next.
Vic… Victoria is here?
Was. We chased her all the way to the Canadian border the other night.
translation.fr: Était. On l'a ramenée à la frontière canadienne.

translation.en: She keeps coming back. We don't know what she's after.
translation.fr: Elle revient constamment. On ignore ce qu'elle veut.

translation.en: I do.
Me.
Don't worry. We've got this place covered.
She won't get near you or Charlie.
translation.fr: Toi et Charlie ne risquez rien.

translation.en: Look, you gotta be careful.
She's fast. You don't know how fast she is.
translation.fr: Elle est rapide. Tu ne peux pas savoir.

translation.en: You know, your lack of confidence in us is a little insulting.
translation.fr: Ton manque de confiance est insultant.

translation.en: All right, I better go.
You gotta go.
Got a vampire to kill.
I'm all right.
Until I'm alone.
And lately, that's all the time.
Jacob's gone, he's hunting Victoria.
And Charlie's hunting Jacob.
And you're gone.
And so is Edward.
And there's just nothing now.
You got something, Harry?
Nope, nothing.
[Bella] But I realize where I have to go.
What I have to do to see him again.
[Edward] Don't do this.
You wanted me to be human.
translation.fr: Tu voulais que je sois humaine.

translation.en: Watch me.
For me.
You won't stay with me any other way.
[Jacob] Breathe.
Come on, Bella. Breathe.
Bella. Bella, can you hear me?
[Jacob] What the hell were you thinking?
I just wanted to see something.
Get her home! I'm gonna go help out over at Harry's place.
translation.fr: Ramène-la ! Je vais aider chez Harry !

translation.en: [Bella] What happened at Harry's?
Harry Clearwater had a heart attack.
translation.fr: Harry Clearwater a eu une attaque.

translation.en: Charlie and my dad are over at his place with his family.
translation.fr: Charlie et mon père sont avec sa famille.

translation.en: Is he okay?
He's gone.
Come on. I'll get you something dry and drive you home.
translation.fr: Je te sèche et je te ramène.

translation.en: Hundred and eight degrees over here.
My hands are freezing.
It must be nice never getting cold.
It's a wolf thing.
It's not. It's a Jacob thing.
You're just warm.
You're like your own sun.
[Jacob] Is this better? Now that you know about me.
translation.fr: C'est mieux ? Maintenant que tu sais, pour moi ?

translation.en: But…
You saw what happened to Emily.
Sam got angry.
Lost it for a split second…
Em was standing too close.
He'll never be able to take that back.
translation.fr: Il ne pourra jamais effacer ça.

translation.en: What if I got mad at you?
Sometimes…
I feel like I'm gonna disappear.
translation.fr: je crois que je vais disparaître.

translation.en: Okay, not that you need me to tell you something like this.
translation.fr: Tu n'as pas besoin de moi... pour te dire ça...

translation.en: But I always will. You're not gonna lose yourself.
translation.fr: mais je le fais. Tu ne te perdras pas.

translation.en: I wouldn't let that happen.
How?
I'll tell you all the time…
how special you are. [chuckles]
Thank you. For everything.
-Wait. -[gasps]
There's a vampire.
How do you know?
I can smell it. I'm getting you out of here.
[Bella] That's Carlisle's car.
They're here.
Bella, it's a trick. Stop! -You gotta come with me. -[grunts]
translation.fr: C'est un piège. Arrête, viens avec moi.

translation.en: They won't hurt me.
Look, if a Cullen is back here, this is their territory.
translation.fr: Ici, un Cullen est sur son territoire.

translation.en: Treaty says we can only defend on our own lands. -I can't protect you here. -Okay, it's okay.
translation.fr: D'après le traité, je ne peux pas te protéger ici.

translation.en: You don't have to.
You're about to cross a line.
Then don't draw one. Please?
I'm sorry, I just-- I can't believe you're here.
translation.fr: Je n'arrive pas à le croire !

translation.en: Would you like to explain to me how you're alive?
translation.fr: Comment as-tu fait pour rester en vie ?

translation.en: I saw a vision of you.
You jumped off a cliff.
Why in the hell would you try and kill yourself?
-I mean, what about Charlie? What about-- -I didn't try to kill myself.
translation.fr: Pense à Charlie ! Je ne veux pas me tuer.

translation.en: I was cliff jumping. Recreationally.
translation.fr: Je sautais d'une falaise. Pour rire.

translation.en: It was fun. [sniffling]
I have never met anyone more prone to life-threatening idiocy.
translation.fr: Personne ne met sa vie en jeu aussi bêtement.

translation.en: Did you… did you tell him?
He only calls in once every few months.
translation.fr: Je reste des mois sans le voir.

translation.en: He said he wants to be alone.
translation.fr: Il dit qu'il veut être seul.

translation.en: Bella, what is that god-awful wet dog smell?
translation.fr: C'est quoi, cette odeur de chien mouillé ?

translation.en: Um… that's probably me.
Or it's Jacob.
[Alice] Jacob who?
Jacob's kind of a werewolf.
Bella! Werewolves are not good company to keep.
Speak for yourself.
I had to see you were safe.
I thought you couldn't protect me here.
translation.fr: Tu ne pouvais pas me protéger.

translation.en: Guess I don't care.
[Alice] Well, I'm not going to hurt her.
No, you're just a harmless Cullen.
I'm talking about the other bloodsucker who tried to kill Bella because of you.
translation.fr: Pas comme l'autre, qui veut tuer Bella par votre faute.

translation.en: -Victoria? -Yeah, Victoria's been around.
I didn't see her.
I didn't see you get pulled out of the water either.
translation.fr: Ni qui t'a sauvée de la noyade.

translation.en: I can't see past you and your pack of mutts.
translation.fr: Vous m'empêchez de voir, toi et ta meute.

translation.en: -Don't get me upset. -Hey, stop.
-Or things are gonna get very ugly. -Stop, stop. Stop, stop.
I'll give you a minute.
You're not going anywhere, you're gonna come back, right?
translation.fr: Tu ne pars pas ? Tu reviens ?

translation.en: As soon as you put the dog out.
translation.fr: Dès que tu auras sorti le chien.

translation.en: Is he…?
Are there others? How many Cullens are here, and how long are they staying?
translation.fr: Il y en a d'autres ? Ils vont rester ?

translation.en: It's just Alice. [sniffs]
And she can stay as long as she'd like.
Are the rest coming back?
Not that I know of. [scoffs]
Anything else?
That's it.
Well, if that's all, then you'd better go run back to Sam.
translation.fr: Si c'est tout, retourne chez Sam.

translation.en: I've done it again.
[Jacob] I keep breaking my promise.
We don't have to do this to each other.
translation.fr: On n'a pas à se faire ça.

translation.en: Yes, we do.
Swan residence.
He's not here right now.
He's arranging a funeral.
Who was that?
Always in the way.
-Who was that? -Bella, step back.
-Jake, who was that? -Bella.
Bella, it's Edward. He thinks you're dead.
[Alice] Rosalie told him why I came here.
translation.fr: Rosalie lui a dit pourquoi j'étais là.

translation.en: Why would you… Why didn't you let me speak to him?
translation.fr: Tu aurais dû me le passer !

translation.en: -He didn't ask for you. -I don't care!
Bella, he's going to the Volturi.
He wants to die too.
[Jacob] He left you, Bella. He didn't want you anymore, remember?
translation.fr: Il t'a quittée, c'est fini. Tu te rappelles ?

translation.en: No, I'm not gonna let him kill himself out of guilt.
translation.fr: Je ne le laisserai pas se tuer par remords.

translation.en: Well, what about your dad?
I'm 18. I'm legally free to go and I left a note.
translation.fr: J'ai 18 ans, je suis majeure et j'ai laissé une lettre.

translation.en: Just… stay here.
[Jacob] For Charlie.
For me.
I have to go.
I'm begging you.
So you've made up your minds.
I'm afraid your particular gifts…
translation.fr: Je crains que tes dons ne soient...

translation.en: are too valuable to destroy.
[clicks tongue] But if you're unhappy with your lot,
join us.
We would be delighted to utilize your skills.
translation.fr: Nous serions ravis d'user de tes talents.

translation.en: Won't you consider staying with us?
You know it will happen anyway.
Not without cause.
Such a waste.
I'm guessing you didn't rent this car?
I figured you wouldn't be opposed to grand theft auto.
translation.fr: Tu n'as rien contre un vol de voiture ?

translation.en: [Bella] Not today.
What? What do you see?
They refused him.
So…
He's gonna make a scene. Show himself to the humans.
translation.fr: Il va faire un scandale. Se révéler aux humains.

translation.en: [Bella] No! When?
[Alice] He's gonna wait until noon, when the sun's at its highest.
translation.fr: Il attendra midi. Le soleil au zénith.

translation.en: -Alice, you gotta hurry up. -There's Volterra.
-Why are they all in red? -San Marco's Day festival.
translation.fr: - Pourquoi le rouge ? - Le festival de St Marcus.

translation.en: They're commemorating the expulsion of vampires from the city.
It's the perfect setting.
The Volturi will never let him get far enough to reveal himself.
translation.fr: Les Volturi ne le laisseront pas faire.

translation.en: We have five minutes.
-[panting] -You know, Bella, just breathe.
you're the only one he can't see coming.
If I go, he'll read my thoughts. He'll think I'm lying. -He'll rush into it. -Where do I go?
translation.fr: Il se méprendrait sur mes pensées et s'élancerait.

translation.en: [Alice] He'll be under the clock tower. Go!
[Edward] Heaven.
You have to move. [panting]
Open your eyes, look at me.
I'm alive.
-You're here. -I'm here.
I needed to make you see me once.
translation.fr: Il fallait que tu me voies.

translation.en: You had to know I was alive, you didn't have to feel guilty about anything.
translation.fr: Je suis en vie, tu n'es coupable en rien.

translation.en: I can let you go now.
I never acted out of guilt.
translation.fr: Je ne me sentais pas coupable.

translation.en: I just couldn't live in a world where you don't exist.
translation.fr: Je ne pouvais vivre dans un monde sans toi.

translation.en: Oh, but you said…
[Edward] I lied. I had to lie.
But you believed me so easily.
Because it doesn't make sense for you to love me.
translation.fr: Parce que tu ne pouvais pas... ...m'aimer.

translation.en: I'm a nothing human. Nothing.
translation.fr: Je ne suis rien qu'une humaine.

translation.en: …you're everything to me.
You're everything.
I won't be needing your services after all, gentlemen.
translation.fr: Je me passerai de vos services.

translation.en: Aro wants to speak with you again.
No rules were broken.
Nonetheless, we should take this conversation
translation.fr: Néanmoins, conversons en un lieu approprié.

translation.en: to a more appropriate venue.
Bella, why don't you go enjoy the rest of the festival.
- The girl comes with us. - No, you can go to hell.
translation.fr: Elle vient avec nous. Allez en enfer.

translation.en: Come on, guys.
It's a festival. You wouldn't want to make a scene.
We wouldn't.
Enough.
Jane.
Aro sent me to see what was taking so long.
translation.fr: Aro se demande ce qui vous retarde.

translation.en: Just do as she says.
Go ahead.
Don't be scared.
Are you?
Is she human?
Does she know?
Then why would…
She wants to be.
And so she will be.
For dessert.
[Alec] Sister. Send you out to get one and you bring back two.
translation.fr: Ma sœur. On t'en demande un et tu en ramènes deux.

translation.en: And a half.
-Such a clever girl. -What a happy surprise!
Bella is alive after all.
Isn't that wonderful.
I love a happy ending.
They are so rare.
[Aro] Her blood appeals to you so much.
It makes me thirsty.
How can you stand to be so close to her?
translation.fr: Comment peux-tu rester si près d'elle ?

translation.en: It's not without difficulty.
Yes, I can see that. [laughs]
Aro can read every thought I've ever had with one touch.
translation.fr: Aro peut lire toutes mes pensées. D'un toucher.

translation.en: [Edward] And now you know everything.
So get on with it.
You are quite a soul reader yourself, Edward.
translation.fr: Tu sais aussi lire dans les âmes.

translation.en: Though… you can't read Bella's thoughts.
translation.fr: Mais pourtant pas les pensées de Bella.

translation.en: Fascinating.
I would love to see if…
you are an exception to my gifts, as well.
translation.fr: si tu es aussi insensible à mes dons.

translation.en: Would you do me the honor?
Interesting.
I see nothing.
[Aro] I wonder if…
Let us see if she is immune to all our powers.
translation.fr: Voyons si elle résiste à chacun de nous.

translation.en: Shall we, Jane?
Pain.
-[Bella] Stop! -[grunts]
Just stop hurting him, please! Please!
translation.fr: Ne lui faites pas de mal !

translation.en: -Master? -[grunts]
Go ahead, my dear.
This may hurt just a little.
Remarkable.
[Aro] She confounds us all.
So, what do we do with you now?
You already know what you're going to do, Aro.
translation.fr: Tu sais déjà ce que tu feras, Aro.

translation.en: She knows too much.
She's a liability.
[Aro] That's true.
Felix.
Kill me, kill me.
Not him.
[Aro] How extraordinary.
You would give up your life…
translation.fr: Tu ferais don de ta vie...

translation.en: for someone like us?
A vampire.
A soulless monster.
[Edward] Just get away from her.
You don't know a thing… about his soul.
translation.fr: Vous ne savez rien... de son âme.

translation.en: [sighing] This is a sadness.
If only it were your intention to give her immortality.
translation.fr: Si seulement tu lui accordais l'immortalité.

translation.en: [Alice] Wait!
Bella will be one of us.
I've seen it.
I'll change her myself.
Mesmerizing, to see what you have seen…
translation.fr: Hallucinant. Voir ce que tu as vu...

translation.en: before it has happened.
Your gifts will make for an intriguing immortal.
translation.fr: Tes dons... feront de toi une étonnante... immortelle.

translation.en: Go now.
Make your preparations.
Let us be done with this.
Heidi will arrive any moment.
Thank you… for your visit.
[Caius] We will return the favor.
I would advise that you follow through on your promise soon.
translation.fr: Respectez votre promesse au plus tôt.

translation.en: [Caius] We do not offer second chances.
[Aro] Goodbye, my young friends.
Nice fishing, Heidi.
Yes, they do look rather juicy.
Save some for me.
[Heidi] This way, please. Stay together.
You're here.
You can sleep.
I'll still be here when you wake up.
translation.fr: Je serai là à ton réveil.

translation.en: The only reason I left…
was because I thought I was protecting you.
I needed you to have a chance
translation.fr: Je voulais... que tu puisses mener une vie normale, heureuse.

translation.en: at a normal, happy life.
translation.fr: que tu puisses mener une vie normale, heureuse.

translation.en: It was so easy for you to leave.
Leaving you was the hardest thing I've done in 100 years.
translation.fr: Je n'ai rien fait de plus difficile en un siècle.

translation.en: I swear…
…I will never fail you again.
translation.fr: de ne plus te faire défaut.

translation.en: I'm so sorry.
Charlie's coming.
You okay?
I'm fine.
Dad, you don't have to worry.
The last time you said that you took off. I didn't see you for three days.
translation.fr: La dernière fois, tu es partie 3 jours.

translation.en: I'm really sorry, Dad.
Bella… do not ever do that to me again.
Ever.
And you're grounded…
for the rest of your life.
translation.fr: pour le restant de tes jours.

translation.en: We're not technically breaking any of his rules.
He did say I couldn't take a step inside the door.
translation.fr: Il m'a interdit de passer la porte.

translation.en: I came in through the window.
translation.fr: Je suis venu par la fenêtre.

translation.en: He's not gonna forgive me easily.
translation.fr: Il ne me pardonnera pas aisément.

translation.en: No.
Can you?
I hope you can, 'cause I honestly don't know
translation.fr: Je l'espère, parce que... je ne pourrais pas vivre sans toi.

translation.en: how to live without you.
translation.fr: je ne pourrais pas vivre sans toi.

translation.en: [Edward softly] Come here.
Once Alice changes me,
you can't get rid of me.
She won't need to change you.
translation.fr: Elle n'aura pas à le faire.

translation.en: There are always ways to keep the Volturi in the dark.
You all know what I want.
translation.fr: Vous savez ce que je veux.

translation.en: And I know how much I'm asking for.
translation.fr: Et je sais... ce que je vous demande.

translation.en: The only thing that I can think of for it to be fair is to just vote.
translation.fr: Pour être équitable, je ne vois qu'un vote.

translation.en: You don't know what you're talking about. Shut up.
I already consider you my sister.
translation.fr: Je te considère comme ma sœur.

translation.en: - Yes. - Thank you.
I vote yes.
It would be nice to not want to kill you all the time.
translation.fr: Pour ne pas songer en permanence à te tuer.

translation.en: I'm sorry.
I'm really sorry to both of you how I've acted.
translation.fr: Excusez-moi tous deux de mon comportement.

translation.en: And I'm really grateful that you were brave enough
translation.fr: Et je te remercie d'avoir eu le courage de sauver mon frère.

translation.en: to go and save my brother.
translation.fr: d'avoir eu le courage de sauver mon frère.

translation.en: But this isn't a life I would have chosen for myself.
translation.fr: Mais je n'aurais pas choisi cette vie.

translation.en: And I wish that there had been someone to vote no for me.
translation.fr: J'aurais aimé qu'on vote non pour moi.

translation.en: So, no.
I vote hell, yeah. [laughs]
And we can pick a fight with these Volturi some other way.
translation.fr: On se battra autrement contre ces Volturi.

translation.en: I already consider you a part of the family.
translation.fr: Tu fais partie de cette famille.

translation.en: Yes.
Why are you doing this to me?
You know what this means.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que ça signifie.

translation.en: You've chosen not to live without her, which leaves me no choice.
translation.fr: Tu ne veux pas vivre sans elle. Je n'ai donc pas le choix.

translation.en: I won't lose my son.
translation.fr: Je ne perdrai pas mon fils.

translation.en: [Bella] I'll wait until after graduation
to make it easier on Charlie.
Edward, I want you to be the one to do it.
translation.fr: J'aimerais que ce soit toi qui le fasse.

translation.en: He wants to talk to me.
[Jacob] So you're still alive for now.
[Edward] He thinks it's me keeping you away.
translation.fr: Il pense que je t'éloigne de lui.

translation.en: [Jacob] You stay the hell out of my head.
I know you have something to say to me.
translation.fr: Je sais que tu veux me parler.

translation.en: But I want to say something to you first, if that's all right.
Thank you for keeping Bella alive when… I didn't.
translation.fr: Merci d'avoir sauvé Bella quand je n'étais pas là.

translation.en: You didn't.
And it wasn't for your benefit, trust me.
translation.fr: Je ne l'ai pas fait pour toi.

translation.en: I'm still grateful.
But I'm here now, and I'm not going to leave her side
translation.fr: Mais je suis revenu. Je ne la quitterai qu'à sa demande.

translation.en: until she orders me away.
translation.fr: Je ne la quitterai qu'à sa demande.

translation.en: We'll see.
[Jacob] Hey. My turn to talk.
I'm here to remind you about a key point in the treaty.
translation.fr: Je te rappelle une clause majeure du traité.

translation.en: I haven't forgotten.
What key point?
If any of them bites a human, the truce is over.
translation.fr: Si l'un d'eux mord un humain... la trêve est rompue.

translation.en: What if I choose it? It has nothing to do with you.
No. No, I won't let you.
You're not gonna be one of them, Bella.
translation.fr: Tu ne seras pas des leurs.

translation.en: It's not up to you.
You know what we'll do to you. I won't have a choice.
translation.fr: Tu sais ce que nous ferons. Je n'aurai pas le choix.

translation.en: -Bella, please come. -Wait.
Is he gonna hurt me? Read his mind.
translation.fr: Il me fera du mal ? Lis en lui.

translation.en: I love you.
don't make me choose.
[Bella] 'Cause it'll be him.
It's always been him.
No, you don't speak for her.
translation.fr: Ne parle pas à sa place.

translation.en: Bella, get out of here.
You can't hurt each other without hurting me.
translation.fr: Vous ne pouvez vous faire du mal sans m'atteindre !

translation.en: [Edward] He's right.
You shouldn't become what I am.
translation.fr: Tu ne devrais pas devenir ce que je suis.

translation.en: I can't do this alone.
Then please just wait.
Just give me… five years.
That's too long.
Then three.
You're so stubborn.
What are you waiting for?
I have one condition.
If you want me to do it myself.
translation.fr: si tu veux que ce soit moi.

translation.en: What's the condition?
And then forever.
That's what I'm asking.
Marry me, Bella.
♪ And as we walk in the dimming light ♪
translation.fr: Adaptation : Philippe VIDECOQ Sous-titrage : ÉCLAIR - PARIS
